Journal Story: I am looking forward to another great year of hiking on be AT! I am looking forward to meeting a new batch of thru-hikers. God Bless!

Happy New Year fellow hikers!I am ready to get on the trail again, but I have been working full time. I have a new adventure planned for this year - the Inca Trail to Machu Picchu! This has been a dream of mine for many years, and I decided to do it this year.I also hope to continue section hiking on the AT after I return from Peru. I have an amazing trip planned that will also include delivering school supplies along the Amazon River.Once my work slows down a bit, I will start training in earnest. I look forward to reading all the trail journals from this year's group of hikers.God bless!
Wildlife and I met yesterday to continue our section hikes of the AT!

We hike a good portion of the day in a cold rain. I was way too cold to stop, so we kept hiking.When we arrived at the shelter, we were the only ones there. Several hikes came in shortly after. It was still only 2 p.m., so we decided to just hike the rest of the way out!
I had to fill in a short section so I could continue north tomorrow!
